summary: A gift of music transports people back to another time and place where they find their truest feelings.
cast: Lacey Chabert|Brennan Elliott|Kathy Najimy|Kevin Chamberlin|Fina Strazza|Mariah Carey|Torrie Wiggins|Maya Farhat|Raelle Wilson|Sasha Brooklyn Stolper|Sydney Lindsay Johnson|Peanut Edmonson|Alexa Glaser|Katie Eichler|Tifani Winkfield|Clara Harris|Lea Lachey|Mishka Stolper|Jimmy Townsend|Alexandra Krevoy|Mark Angel|William Cross|Jim Gloyd|Chris Hill|David Pittinger|James Siderits|William Willet
title: A Christmas Melody
